title: Figure, late 19th or 20th century
creditline: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
description: Standing female figure, nude except for feather belt and short mantle, and wearing feather headdress. Blue beads in right hand, and branch of coral in left. Leaning against a large elephant tusk. Probably intended to be Africa (painted black), but here representing America.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, late 19th or 20th century.
late 19th or 20th century. Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome and gilt. Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde. 1960-1-33.
